title: Team Transactions Renders Elements
custom_steps: When user taps on Transactions link
custom_expected:
* Then a list of Transactions (roster moves like signings, promotions/demotions) for that selected team only is displayed. The background tint for the header should also match selected team colors.

* The navigation header will have a calendar icon

title: Transactions Date Range - Lower Bound
custom_steps: Select a date less than January 1st two years ago
custom_expected: The date picker will adjust to January 1st two years ago

title: Date selection with transaction
custom_steps: When a user selects a date that contains a transaction
custom_expected: The table scrolls directly to that transaction

title: Date selection with no transaction available - Auto
custom_steps:
WHEN the user scrolls to a date 
AND there are no transactions available
custom_expected:
THEN the date will not be displayed in the table view.
AND there will be a temporary alert displayed ("No transactions for [DATE]")
AND the alert will dismiss automatically.

title: Transactions Date Range - Upper Bound
custom_steps: Select any date in the future
custom_expected: The date picker will adjust to today's date
